screen.fbp.reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the FBP settings?
button.fbp.report:
Found a bug?
Report it here!
tooltip.fbp.particles_decay: If disabled, particles will not disappear.
tooltip.fbp.particles_per_axis: Number of the destroy particles on x, y and z axis.
tooltip.fbp.min_lifetime:
Minimum, random value for the lifetime of the particles.
If you want every particle to disappear at the same time, set the same value for minimum and maximum particle lifetime.
tooltip.fbp.max_lifetime:
Maximum, random value for the lifetime of the particles.
If you want every particle to disappear at the same time, set the same value for minimum and maximum particle lifetime.
tooltip.fbp.scale_multiplier: Particle scale multiplier. The higher the value, the larger the particles will be.
tooltip.fbp.rotation_multiplier: Particle rotation multiplier. The higher the value, the faster and more the particles will rotate.
tooltip.fbp.gravity_multiplier: Particle gravity multiplier. The higher the value, the faster the particles will fall to the ground.
tooltip.fbp.weather_particle_density: Weather particle density. The higher the value, the more weather particles will appear.
tooltip.fbp.fancy_block_breaking: Enable or disable fancy block breaking particles.
tooltip.fbp.fancy_flame: Enable or disable fancy flame particles.
tooltip.fbp.fancy_smoke: Enable or disable fancy smoke particles.
tooltip.fbp.fancy_rain: Enable or disable fancy rain particles.
tooltip.fbp.fancy_snow: Enable or disable fancy snow particles.
tooltip.fbp.fancy_place_animation: Enable or disable fancy block placing animation.
tooltip.fbp.cartoon_mode: Enable or disable particles cartoon mode.
tooltip.fbp.low_traction: Enable or disable particle low traction.
tooltip.fbp.spawn_while_frozen: Enable or disable particle spawning while frozen.
tooltip.fbp.smooth_animation_lighting: Enable or disable smooth animation lighting.
tooltip.fbp.spawn_place_particles: Enable or disable spawning block placing particles.
tooltip.fbp.rest_on_floor: Enable or disable resting particles on floor.
tooltip.fbp.bounce_off_walls: Enable or disable bouncing particles off walls.
tooltip.fbp.entity_collision: Enable or disable particles collisions with entities.
tooltip.fbp.water_physics: Enable or disable particles water physics.
tooltip.fbp.random_scale: Enable or disable particles random scale.
tooltip.fbp.random_rotation: Enable or disable particles random rotation.
tooltip.fbp.random_fading_speed: Enable or disable particles random fading speed.
